Dear Ms. Sharon Pinto/ Ms. Rose,

 

Wish you are doing well.

 

Requesting you to share the below documents for Ralph Lauren Outlet_SG0.

 

1.Insurances: 

*	Property All Risks/Fire & Allied Perils/Business Interruption - include “Waiver of Subrogation against the Landlord”  clause.

*	Third-Party Liability policy reflecting the following:Insured amount of note less than AED 10 Million.

- Dubai Outlet Mall to be added as additional/joint insured.

- Policy shall be extended to cover Cross Liabilities.

*	Workmen’s compensation including Employers Liability Insurance – Insured amount of not less than AED 2 Million.

 All insurance policies must contain full description of the insured premises/location.

 

2. Trade License including partner page.

 

3. Passport, Visa and Emirates Id copy of cheque Signatory and Lease Signatory.

 

Here I’m sharing with you Tenant contact Information form for our record. Expecting from your side to fill and send back to us.

 

Stay Safe & Healthy,

 

Megha Sagar

Retail Coordinator

Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >; May Karaki <May.Karaki@chalhoub.com <mailto:May.Karaki@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Ralph Lauren Outlet_SG03 - Request for Legal Documents.
Importance: High

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Ms. Sharon Pinto/ Ms. Rose,

 

Wish you are doing well.

 

Requesting you to share the below documents for Ralph Lauren Outlet_SG0.

 

1.Insurances: 

*	Property All Risks/Fire & Allied Perils/Business Interruption - include “Waiver of Subrogation against the Landlord”  clause.

*	Third-Party Liability policy reflecting the following:Insured amount of note less than AED 10 Million.

- Dubai Outlet Mall to be added as additional/joint insured.

- Policy shall be extended to cover Cross Liabilities.

*	Workmen’s compensation including Employers Liability Insurance – Insured amount of not less than AED 2 Million.

 All insurance policies must contain full description of the insured premises/location.

 

2. Trade License including partner page.

 

3. Passport, Visa and Emirates Id copy of cheque Signatory and Lease Signatory.

 

Here I’m sharing with you Tenant contact Information form for our record. Expecting from your side to fill and send back to us.

 

Stay Safe & Healthy,

 

Megha Sagar

Retail Coordinator
